description: The VideoSecu articulating mount ML513B supports VESA 75x75 and 100x100mm LCD LED TV monitor flat panel weighing less than 55 lbs (25 kg). This mount is ideal for anyone requiring a medium heavy duty cantilever mount with advanced features. 3 pivot points design provides easy 15 degree forward and backward tilt, 180 degree side-to-side swivel and max 20" extension from wall. Tilt, swivel and extension feature for optimal viewing, pull out and position the display to almost any direction. The ring cable management system design on arm guides wires and prevent cable pinching. Its simple and strong steel construction is becoming the first choice for the LCD LED TV Monitor. VideoSecu brand articulating arm mount, please report to Amazon if you receive a mount without VideoSecu logo.
title: VideoSecu Long Articulating LCD LED TV Monitor Flat Panel TV Wall Mount, 20 inch Extension 55 lb loading capacity VESA 75mm/100 mm 1US
